taco_soup.description: Hearty and flavorful Taco Soup with ground beef, beans, and corn. Served with cheese, sour cream, and tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onion and bell pepper, cook until softened.
Add diced tomatoes, black beans, corn, taco seasoning, and chicken broth.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes.
Ladle soup into bowls and top with shredded cheese, sour cream, and tortilla chips.

cheddar_bay_biscuit_cobbler.description: A savory cobbler made with cheese biscuits and a creamy shrimp and vegetable filling.
ingredients: 1 lb medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
instructions: In a pan, sauté shrimp, onion, and garlic over medium heat until shrimp is pink and vegetables are tender.
Stir in mixed vegetables, mayonnaise, sour cream, Parmesan cheese, milk, lemon juice, parsley, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Pour mixture into a 9-inch baking dish.
In a bowl, combine baking mix, milk, cheddar cheese, and melted butter.
Drop spoonfuls of the biscuit mixture over the shrimp mixture.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, until biscuits are golden brown and filling is bubbly.

cheesy_bean_salsa_chicken.description: A cheesy and flavorful chicken dish made with salsa, black beans, corn, and cheddar cheese.
ingredients: 1 can black beans, rinsed and drained
instructions: Place chicken in a baking dish and cover with salsa.
Add black beans and corn on top of the chicken.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.
Sprinkle cheddar cheese over the chicken and bake for another 5-10 minutes until cheese is melted.
